text: served me cooked sushi when i ordered raw. refused to refund me. very bad service from owner. GLITTER!

Amazing challa, great selection friendly staff.

We purchased a variety of kiishes, all of them were amazing.

The challa was also the best.

Good prices too.
Food is good but staff is extremely rude.  I would not come back as there may places in To with excellent food and great service.gg
